title: Gunnar's Passage
description: Gunnar's Passage will lead her to discover her lineage of wolves, witches and a hot legendary rock group who happens to be her father and uncles. How it intertwines with a club called Thirsty in a small town who employs the most popular rock band in their territory. Her tale will take you into a paranormal world where things goes bump in the night. Her independence guides her to a place where exquisitely "sizzling hot' looking people work and play. She questions why so many beautiful looking people who happens to have the most tantalizing physiques living in this quaint town. Gunnar cannot understand why Timeless the rock group that performs in Thirsty remains a hidden treasure. Her love and talent for rock music which was influenced by her upbringing came to a full circle when her father's rock band Legend made their appearance in that small quaint town she discovered. If you want to meet people that rocks your world with their alluringly good looks and their zest for life, Gunnar will definitely introduce you to them. Only her destiny will tell her tale in this paranormal roller coaster.
author: Darlene Cruz
